title: Alito Assured Ted Kennedy in 2005 of Respect for Roe v. Wade, Diary Says
description: In the senatorâ€™s recollection, the Supreme Court justice who wrote the opinion overturning the abortion ruling tried to show Mr. Kennedy that he was not a threat to Roe.

media:description: Senator Edward M. Kennedy, Democrat of Massachusetts, questioned Samuel A. Alito Jr. during his Supreme Court confirmation hearing in 2006.
